items.summary: Fix the frontend so that when the user selects Language = English or Language = Telugu from the Language dropdown, the Mantra Text Display section renders the mantra text returned by the backend for the current (Veda, Mantra Number) selection (and does not remain empty or show "No text available" when valid text exists).

Fix the backend data/state so that getMantraText(#samaVeda, 47, #english) and getMantraText(#samaVeda, 47, #telugu) return non-empty mantra text values (not the meaning), and ensure this correction is applied to already-deployed canister state via a conditional migration if needed (without changing the public query APIs).
